app.title: Biomedical Sample Size Calculator
app.subtitle: Professional statistical tools for research design

welcome.title: üëã Welcome to the Biomedical Sample Size Calculator
welcome.subtitle: Choose the type of statistical analysis you need for your research study
welcome.estimationDesc: Calculate sample sizes for estimating population parameters with specific precision
welcome.hypothesisDesc: Calculate sample sizes for comparing groups and testing statistical hypotheses
welcome.ratesDesc: Calculate sample sizes for time-to-event and rate comparison studies
welcome.help: üí° Not sure which test to use? Each calculator includes detailed explanations and examples to help you choose the right method for your research.

calculators.roundedUp: Rounded up to the nearest whole number
calculators.eventsNote: These are the required number of events, not subjects

tooltips.beta: Type II error rate (e.g., 0.2 for 80% power)
tooltips.p: Estimated proportion of the attribute in the population (use 0.5 if unknown)
tooltips.sd: Estimated standard deviation of the population
tooltips.p1: Expected proportion in the first group
tooltips.p2: Expected proportion in the second group
tooltips.p0: The proportion under the null hypothesis
tooltips.pa: The proportion under the alternative hypothesis
tooltips.lambda1: Incidence rate in group 1 (events per person-year)
tooltips.k: Ratio of subjects in group 2 to group 1 (e.g., 1 for equal groups)

errors.differentValues: Values must be different from each other.
errors.correlationRange: Correlation must be between -1 and 1 (and not 0).
errors.p1Exceeds1: The calculated p1 exceeds 1. Please adjust your OR or p2 values.
errors.rrP1Exceeds1: The calculated p1 exceeds 1. Please adjust your RR or p2 values.

app.footer: Made By Mohamad AlJasem and Prof. Alipasha Meysamie - Tehran University of Medical Sciences

pwa.installDescription: Install this app on your device for quick access and offline use.
